About 2,400 businessmen and politicians are expected to attend the
annual World Economic Forum in Davos, including 900 company chief
executives and board chairs and 24 heads of state -- among them
British Prime Minister Tony Blair and German Chancellor Angela
Merkel.

I wish I was there?

LP MMM

P.S.  ICK Direktorica AB vsaj ve o cem govori...

http://wsf2007.org

Among the pressing issues to be discussed are Economic Partnership
Agreements (EPAs) currently being negotiated between the European
Union and countries in Africa, the Caribbean and Pacific
regions.

BBC se pogovarjal z Mery Robinson, ex-Irsko Predsednico, High UN
Commissioner for human rights, ki gre iz Nairobi v Davos.

http://www.spiegel.d...60,00.html< /a>

Upam, da ves kaj se dogaja v sosescini, ce ti ze text filter
nagaja?
